name: Celtx Project File
summary: Learn about .CELTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Celtx can be used for film, video, radio, theater, video games, music videos, podcasts, videocasts, and comic strip projects. CELTX is an acronym that stands for "Crew, Equipment, Location, Talent and XML." It is pronounced "kell-ticks."

description: Project created with Celtx, an all-in-one media pre-production software program; includes project scheduling, screenplay development, and storyboard creation features; all data is stored in a database format within a single CELTX file.
